## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G04000](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G04000)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ChlADR</u>
- **Gene Name:** chloroplast aldehyde reductase
- **Description:**   NAD(P)-binding Rossmann-fold superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2095918
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
